text: læa meux rea di hı mnusʹy lim rs khwam metta phwk khea k dicı tx man læa meux thukkh ray xan dı prasb kæ phwk khea neuxngdwy sing thi mux khxng phwk khea prakxb wi læw phwk khea k hmdxalay B30:036:1B xi bnu kasʹi rk la w wa xan ni penkar klaw thung khxtheccring khxng mnusʹy nxkcak phu thi xallxhˌ thrng khumkhrxng khea khux meux khea di rab khwam pordpran khea k dicı læa lumtaw tæ meux prasb kab khwam thukkh yak khea k hmdxalay læa sin hwang
